 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Ease\TWB;
 4: 
 5: /**
 6:  * Stránka TwitterBootstrap.
 7:  *
 8:  * @author     Vítězslav Dvořák <vitex@hippy.cz>
 9:  * @copyright  2012 Vitex@vitexsoftware.cz (G)
10:  *
11:  * @link       http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/index.html
12:  */
13: class WebPage extends \Ease\WebPage
14: {
15:     /**
16:      * Boostrap URL Strart path with ./ to use local one.
17:      *
18:      * @var string relative path/url
19:      */
20:     public $mainStyle = 'twitter-bootstrap/css/bootstrap.css';
21: 
22:     /**
23:      * Stránka s podporou pro twitter bootstrap.
24:      *
25:      * @param string   $pageTitle
26:      * @param EaseUser $userObject
27:      */
28:     public function __construct($pageTitle = null)
29:     {
30:         parent::__construct($pageTitle);
31:         $this->includeCss($this->mainStyle, ($this->mainStyle[0] != '.'));
32:         $this->head->addItem(
33:             '<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0">'
34:         );
35:     }
36: 
37:     /**
38:      * Vrací zprávy uživatele.
39:      *
40:      * @param string $what info|warning|error|success
41:      *
42:      * @return string
43:      */
44:     public function getStatusMessagesAsHtml($what = null)
45:     {
46:         /*
47:          * Session Singleton Problem hack
48:          */
49:         if (!count($this->easeShared->statusMessages)) {
50:             return '';
51:         }
52:         $htmlFargment = '';
53: 
54:         $allMessages = [];
55:         foreach ($this->easeShared->statusMessages as $quee => $messages) {
56:             foreach ($messages as $msgID => $message) {
57:                 $allMessages[$msgID][$quee] = $message;
58:             }
59:         }
60:         ksort($allMessages);
61:         foreach ($allMessages as $messages) {
62:             $messageType = key($messages);
63: 
64:             if (is_array($what)) {
65:                 if (!in_array($messageType, $what)) {
66:                     continue;
67:                 }
68:             }
69: 
70:             foreach ($messages as $message) {
71:                 if (is_object($this->logger)) {
72:                     if (!isset($this->logger->logStyles[$messageType])) {
73:                         $messageType = 'notice';
74:                     }
75:                     if ($messageType == 'error') {
76:                         $messageType = 'danger';
77:                     }
78:                     $htmlFargment .= '<div class="alert alert-'.$messageType.'" >'.$message.'</div>'."\n";
79:                 } else {
80:                     $htmlFargment .= '<div class="alert">'.$message.'</div>'."\n";
81:                 }
82:             }
83:         }
84: 
85:         return $htmlFargment;
86:     }
87: }
88:
